title: Frose
ingredients_key: Rose (750mL, something full-bodied and dark in color, such as a pinot noir or merlot-based rose)
recipe: Pour the rose into a 13 x 9 baking pan, and place in the freezer for up to 6 hours or until almost solid.
Remove the mixture and scrape into a blender, chopping up the larger icy bits.
Add the remaining ingredients along with 3/4 cup crushed ice to the blender, and puree until thickened.
